topic.title: WOMEN LOST TO FOLLOW-UP TOTAL (AFTER TECHNICALLY INADEQUATE SCREENING MAMMOGRAM)
topic.shortdesc: WOMEN LOST TO FOLLOW-UP TOTAL (AFTER TECHNICALLY INADEQUATE SCREENING MAMMOGRAM) is the total number of women:with a BREAST SCREENING MAMMOGRAPHY OUTCOME CODE recorded as National Code 'Inadequate test',who failed to attend subsequent invitations to complete their Breast Screening,and for whom no REFERRAL REQUEST for Breast Assessment was made based on their inadequate test.
